琑字的基本解释

琑
义未详。

琑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suǒ］
［《廣韻》蘇果切，上果，心。］
亦作“琑1”。亦作“璅1”。“琐1”的繁体字。
(1)细碎的玉声。
(2)细碎；细小。
(3)形容人品卑劣，猥琐。
(4)指卑鄙者，小人。
(5)仔细。
(6)门窗上绘画或镂刻的连环图案。以多用于宫门，故亦指代宫门。
(7)通“鎖”。锁链；连环。
(8)通“鎖”。封锁，闭锁。
(9)姓。宋有琐政。见《正字通·玉部》。

琑字的康熙字典解释
琑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
琑字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Xuan
The meaning is unclear.
Xuan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suǒ］
["Guangyun" Suguo cut, fruit, heart. ]
Also known as "琑1". Also known as "璅1". The traditional characters of "Sorry 1".
(1) The sound of broken jade.
(2) Finely broken; fine.
(3) Describe the despicable character and insignificant character.
(4) Refers to the despicable, the villain.
(5) Careful.
(6) The serial patterns painted or carved on doors and windows. It is mostly used for palace gates, so it also refers to palace gates.
(7) Through "lock". Chain; chain link.
(8) Through "lock". Blocked, locked.
(9) Last name. Song has trivial politics. See "Zhengzitong·Jade Department".
Xuan
